Title: With class struggle as the key link, set off a new high tide in revolutionary production
Designer: Pajiatijia Rufu (帕加提加如夫)Yimamu Yiming (伊玛木伊明)
Publisher: Xinjiang renmin chubanshe (新疆人民出版社), Ürümqi
Notes: A Han-Chinese and an Uyghur textile worker in a factory hall. The book the woman on the right holds is an Uyghur edition of a compilation of articles by Marx, Engels and Lenin on the 'Dictatorship of the Proletariat'. The text on the apron of the woman on the left: Grasp revolution, increase production (抓革命促生产).The first designer is classified as 'student', the second as 'worker'. Poster published in Xinjiang (新疆).
